title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Highly experienced Senior Backend Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in designing, developing, and deploying robust, scalable, and high-performance distributed systems. Proficient in Python, Go, and Java, with extensive experience across cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), microservices architectures, and various data storage solutions. Proven track record in leading complex projects, mentoring junior engineers, and optimizing system reliability and performance.

description: Led the design and implementation of a new real-time data processing pipeline using Kafka and Go, improving data ingestion rates by 40%.
Architected and developed a scalable microservices platform using Kubernetes on AWS, significantly reducing operational overhead.
Mentored a team of 3 junior engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and deployment strategies.
Optimized database queries and introduced caching mechanisms (Redis) to enhance application response times by 25%.
Developed and maintained core backend services for a high-traffic e-commerce platform using Python (Django/Flask) and PostgreSQL.
Implemented RESTful APIs to integrate with various third-party services, ensuring data consistency and security.
Collaborated with frontend teams to define API contracts and ensure seamless integration of user interfaces.
Participated in on-call rotations to support and troubleshoot production systems, reducing incident resolution time by 15%.
Assisted in the development of new features for a legacy Java-based enterprise application.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and system stability.
Contributed to bug fixes and performance improvements under the guidance of senior developers.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
